content.title: Tullow to increase oil production to 180000 barrels in 2019 - Myjoyonline.com
content.desc: Tullow Ghana says it is targeting a growth in production from the current 147, 000 barrels to 180000 in 2019.

content.title: Tullow estimates Ghana oil production to go up to 180000 barrels next year - GhanaWeb
content.desc: Tullow-Ghana's drilling program is targeting a significant growth production from around 147, 000 barrels to 180,000 in 2019. The company was working to ...
